name: TappecueThermometer
0:
”Alexa, ask Tappecue Thermometer for my temperatures”
”Alexa, ask Tappecue Thermometer to get sessions”
”Alexa, ask Tappecue Thermometer to get temperatures”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tappecue thermometer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tappecue WiFi BBQ Thermometer - Now on all your Alexa devices.

https://www.tappecue.com

This is a third-party integration with Tappecue to extend the functionality of their platform onto Alexa. Ask about your thermometer's temperatures from anywhere, and get a prompt response. Happy BBQ!

For any Support or Questions - Please do not reach out to Tappecue directly. This is a third-party integration and the developer is handling ongoing support.
